snippet.title: co-open | launch trailer | itch.io
snippet.description:
In co-open you play as a kid who is sent on their first independent grocery run by their grandmother, and you are free to get whatever you like! 
Aside from the casual shopping experience, there are also other places to explore, and a variety of characters with small cute personal quests! Other features include: various cats (and a dog!), vents, a maze, secret phone calls, art appreciation, a big crow, and unlimited snowballs.

Genre: FPS (first person shopping), slice of life, adventure

Get the game here: https://lowpolis.itch.io/co-open

Made by lowpolis.
Soundtrack by Kyle Yerhot.
